name: Gachi Dash
description:
Gachi Dash - is the first project from BumbocsDev. An exciting adventure through the most unusual places in Russia. Visit the places known to every person and feel the atmosphere of the fact that you need to escape from there as soon as possible. Run as fast as you can, but be careful, the exit path is not always straight, so you will have to avoid numerous obstacles! Try your luck in two game modes. Classic gameplay game known and understandable for every. Just jump and try not to die!

Unique Features

  • Story mode which contains eight levels with increasing complexity in different locations. (My mom cried with happiness when she complete all of it)
  • Endless mode - in this mode you can play to the infinite and set a new world record in this Olympic discipline.
  • Money system - while playing Endless mode you can collect some ♂️ bucks ♂️ which you can spend in the shop.
  • Random memes - while playing Endless mode you will find a random meme every 10 ♂️ bucks ♂️.
  • Exploded level design - you will not see this anywhere. (Avoid bottles , this is your scariest enemy)
